sentences: Chen was born in Taiwan and initially studied classical music.
She particularly listened to Romantic composers and moved aged 16 to New York's Juilliard School, mainly to study oboe.
She then continued her studies at The New School and took jazz piano lessons from Sam Yahel.
Chen's first album, Obsession, was released in 2009.
In 2014, Chen, as "the first Taiwanese jazz artist signed to a major label", released Stranger, an album consisting largely of her original compositions.
